DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study specifically investigate ( 1 ) exercise muscle oxygenation response diabetic postmenopausal woman ; ( 2 ) dose-response different physical activity intervention skeletal muscle oxygenation response ; ( 3 ) relate mechanisms training effect .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Different Exercise Training Dose Exercise Performance Noninvasively Estimated Muscle Oxygen Extraction Diabetic Postmenopausal Women
